text: Ara tamra lokera tamra kache ela, udabhranta haye tamra dike ela, ara age theke'i tara kukarma kare yacchila. Tini balalena -- ''he amara sampradaya! Era'i amara kan'ya, era tomadera jan'ya pabitratara, kaje'i allah‌ke bhayabhakti kara, ara amara meh‌manadera sanbandhe amake lajjita kara na. Tomadera madhye ki kono bhala manusa ne'i?’’
